verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> a message <S%H1697><s%> was revealed <S%H1540><s%> to Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Belteshazzar; <S%H1095><s%> and the message <S%H1697><s%> was true <S%H571><s%> and [one of] great <S%H1419><s%> conflict, <S%H6635><s%> but he understood <S%H995><s%> the message <S%H1697><s%> and had an understanding <S%H998><s%> of the vision. <S%H4758><s%>
In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> I, Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> mourning <S%H56><s%> for three <S%H7969><s%> entire <S%H3117><s%> weeks. <S%H7620><s%>

I did not eat <S%H398><s%> any tasty <S%H9143><s%> food, <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> did meat <S%H1320><s%> or wine <S%H3196><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> did I use <S%H5480><s%> any ointment <S%H5480><s%> at all, until <S%H5704><s%> the entire <S%H3117><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> were completed. <S%H4390><s%>

And on the twenty-fourth day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> while I was by the bank <S%H3027><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> that is, the Tigris, <S%H2313><s%>

I lifted <S%H5375><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> dressed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> whose waist <S%H4975><s%> was girded <S%H2296><s%> with [a belt of] pure <S%H3800><s%> gold <S%H3800><s%> of Uphaz. <S%H210><s%>

His body <S%H1472><s%> also was like beryl, <S%H8658><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> had the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of lightning, <S%H1300><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were like flaming <S%H784><s%> torches, <S%H3940><s%> his arms <S%H2220><s%> and feet <S%H4772><s%> like the gleam <S%H5869><s%> of polished <S%H7044><s%> bronze, <S%H5178><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%> like the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a tumult. <S%H1995><s%>

Now I, Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the vision, <S%H4759><s%> while the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with me did not see <S%H7200><s%> the vision; <S%H4759><s%> nevertheless, <S%H61><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> dread <S%H2731><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on them, and they ran <S%H1272><s%> away <S%H1272><s%> to hide <S%H2244><s%> themselves.

So I was left <S%H7604><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> vision; <S%H4759><s%> yet no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> was left <S%H7604><s%> in me, for my natural <S%H1935><s%> color <S%H1935><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> to a deathly <S%H4889><s%> pallor, <S%H4889><s%> and I retained <S%H6113><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>

But I heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of his words; <S%H1697><s%> and as soon as I heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of his words, <S%H1697><s%> I fell <S%H7290><s%> into a deep <S%H7290><s%> sleep <S%H7290><s%> on my face, <S%H6440><s%> with my face <S%H6440><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
Then behold, <S%H2009><s%> a hand <S%H3027><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> me and set <S%H5128><s%> me trembling <S%H5128><s%> on my hands <S%H3709><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and knees. <S%H1290><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "O Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of high <S%H9143><s%> esteem, <S%H9143><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that I am about to tell <S%H1696><s%> you and stand <S%H5975><s%> upright, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H5977><s%> for I have now <S%H6258><s%> been sent <S%H7971><s%> to you." And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> to me, I stood <S%H5975><s%> up trembling. <S%H7460><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Do not be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> for from the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that you set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> on understanding <S%H995><s%> [this] and on humbling <S%H6031><s%> yourself before <S%H6440><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> were heard, <S%H8085><s%> and I have come <S%H935><s%> in response to your words. <S%H1697><s%>

"But the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> was withstanding <S%H5975><s%> me for twenty-one <S%H259><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> then behold, <S%H2009><s%> Michael, <S%H4317><s%> one of the chief <S%H7223><s%> princes, <S%H8269><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> me, for I had been left <S%H3498><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Persia. <S%H6539><s%>

"Now I have come <S%H935><s%> to give <S%H995><s%> you an understanding <S%H995><s%> of what <S%H834><s%> will happen <S%H7136><s%> to your people <S%H5971><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> for the vision <S%H2377><s%> pertains to the days <S%H3117><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> [future.]"

And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to me according to these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> I turned <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground <S%H776><s%> and became <S%H481><s%> speechless. <S%H481><s%>

And behold, <S%H2009><s%> one who <S%H1823><s%> resembled <S%H1823><s%> a human <S%H120><s%> being <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> was touching <S%H5060><s%> my lips; <S%H8193><s%> then I opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> and spoke, <S%H1696><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him who was standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me, "O my lord, <S%H113><s%> as a result of the vision <S%H4759><s%> anguish <S%H9483><s%> has come <S%H2015><s%> upon me, and I have retained <S%H6113><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>

"For how <S%H1963><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> such <S%H2088><s%> a servant <S%H5650><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> with such <S%H2088><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%>? As for me, there remains <S%H5975><s%> just now <S%H6258><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> in me, nor <S%H3808><s%> has any breath <S%H5397><s%> been left <S%H7604><s%> in me."
Then [this] one with human <S%H120><s%> appearance <S%H4758><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> me again <S%H3254><s%> and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> me.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "O man <S%H376><s%> of high <S%H9143><s%> esteem, <S%H9143><s%> do not be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be with you; take <S%H2388><s%> courage <S%H2388><s%> and be courageous! <S%H2388><s%>" Now as soon as he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, I received <S%H2388><s%> strength <S%H2388><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "May my lord <S%H113><s%> speak, <S%H1696><s%> for you have strengthened <S%H2388><s%> me."

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "Do you understand <S%H3045><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> to you? But I shall now <S%H6258><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Persia; <S%H6539><s%> so I am going <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Greece <S%H3120><s%> is about to come. <S%H935><s%>

"However, <S%H61><s%> I will tell <S%H5046><s%> you what is inscribed <S%H7559><s%> in the writing <S%H3791><s%> of truth. <S%H571><s%> Yet there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H259><s%> who stands <S%H2388><s%> firmly <S%H2388><s%> with me against <S%H5921><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [forces] except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Michael <S%H4317><s%> your prince. <S%H8269><s%>
